items.sentence: I know someone in your position wouldn't do something like that.
I know that I don't know everything there is to know about that.
This is the most expensive bottle of wine that I've ever bought.
This looks like orange juice, but it isn't. I wonder what it is.
The doctor monitored the patient's heartbeat and blood pressure.
I've googled you and found out that you've spent time in prison.
This village is one of the most beautiful places I've ever been.
Tom said that he knew that he might be allowed to do that today.
Tom spent the money that his grandmother had given him on books.
Tom would probably go to Australia with you if you asked him to.
Tom was killed in an automobile accident last year in Australia.
If you stick around after class, I can help you with your essay.
You should always wear a seat belt when you are riding in a car.
I've heard that you shouldn't eat red meat more than once a day.
It isn't polite to interrupt a person when he or she is talking.
One of my grandmothers is Jewish, and the other's an antisemite.
I bought this book yesterday and finished reading it last night.
Tom took the ring off of his finger and threw it into the river.
Tom gets up early every Monday and goes to the park to meditate.
Tom was the only one in the office when I got here this morning.
